ingredients.ingredient: ½ bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, or more to taste
2 teaspoons olive oil, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Grill corn over medium-high heat, turning frequently, until kernels are tender with light char
Cut warm corn kernels from cob using a sharp knife held vertically for clean, efficient removal
Combine warm corn with fresh vegetables and cilantro while corn is still slightly warm for better flavor absorption
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create a simple, fresh corn salad where the natural sweetness of grilled corn shines with bright, fresh ingredients.
